salt-grain.name: siepic_tools_dev
salt-grain.title: SiEPIC Tools Development
salt-grain.doc: An alpha library providing a range of tools for designing Silicon Electronic-Photonic Integrated Circuits. This library is NOT stable. Stable releases should be installed via the library siepic_tools
salt-grain.author: Lukas Chrostowski, Jaspreet Jhoja, Mustafa Hammood, Brett Poulsen, Jonas Flueckiger, Rounak Singh Narde, Chris Luzeqin, Nathan Smith, Stefan Preble, Claudio Alarcon-Reyes
salt-grain.author-contact: GitHub: lukasc-ubc, jaspreetj, mustafacc, bpoulse, jfluecki, rounaksingh, luzeqin, nsmith5, StefanPreble, clalarco
